name: Froggy In The Trap Castle
description:
Your goal is to move from start to finish while avoiding the deadly traps that trying to kill you. When you reach the target flag, a new round begins and a new type of trap appears. If you go through all the rounds, you survive, but if you go into a trap, you get back to the beginning of that round (in hard mode you get back to the beginning of the level)

We made this game for school project.

The game made by:
- Bauer Dávid Gergő
- Banka Dominik
- Bajári Patrik

Art packs used:

Some Art: https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

Level Door: https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
